author: Belinda Klostermann
description: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.Special ingredient #1: Pineapple infused Suze (Suze infused with dried pineapple at 65 degrees for 2 hours).
name: Luchadora
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'simple' (1 sugar to 1 water, 48°Brix)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
Special ingredient #1: Pineapple infused Suze (Suze infused with dried pineapple at 65 degrees for 2 hours)
